title: AWS Config Configuration Recorder Stopped
description: Detects when the AWS Config recorder is stopped or deleted. AWS Config tracks resource history and compliance; disabling it removes visibility into resource changes and security posture.
author: Antigravity
false_positives: Planned decommissioning of an AWS account
recommendation: Investigate immediately. If Config was stopped, you lose historical data on resource changes. Re-enable it and check for other unauthorized changes.
